title: T206 Hofman to trade for Sovereign
author: HercDriver

posts.post_title: T206 Hofman to trade for Sovereign
posts.post_content:
Anybody interested in a T206 Solly Hofman for a T205 or T206 Sovereign in similar shape?  Hofman was the guy that fielded Merkle's infamous hit, then overthrew Evers before the Cubs eventually got the force at second base.  The card is in pretty decent shape, and I'll even throw in the hole for free so you can wear it as a necklace!

Take Care,
Geno

[IMG]http://i144.photobucket.com/albums/r181/HercDriver_photo/T206HofmanFront.jpg[/IMG]
